## PopulatedARTHTransaction interface

A transaction that has been prepared for sending.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PopulatedARTHTransaction<P = unknown, T extends SentARTHTransaction = SentARTHTransaction> 
```

## Remarks

Implemented by [PopulatedEthersARTHTransaction](./arth-ethers.populatedethersarthtransaction.md)<!-- -->.
